stories.text: I'm planning for a startup, and I have started developing the backend. I'm the only person working on it currently. I just wanted to ask How to come up with an MVP? The tech stack i'm planning to use is golang (gin) for backend and react native for front end. It would be great help i can get links to certain resources.
stories.title: Ask HN: How should one plan a MVP for startup?

stories.text: Errors are the part of Development Process and Software Testers play a vital role in resolving and achieving bug-free solutions. There are some crucial Software Errors that every testers should know in order to make their efforts much more quick and easier.
stories.title: Testers Must Know the Crucial Types of Errors
